actionCalls.description: Send email notification to DoA levels who are not the ultimate DoA Approver in the process. (Ultimate DoA Approver will receive email notification sent from the Approval Process)
actionCalls.name: Notify_other_DoA_levels_0
actionCalls.label: Notify other DoA levels

value.stringValue: [DoA Info ONLY] Approval Requested - No Action Required

assignments.name: Add_to_DoA_Line_Item_collection
assignments.label: Add to DoA Line Item collection

assignments.description: Add Default Price x Quantity of the product to the variable.
assignments.name: Add_to_Sum_of_MRR_Default_Total_Price
assignments.label: Add to Sum of MRR Default Total Price

assignments.description: Add Default Price x Quantity of the product to the variable
assignments.name: Add_to_Sum_of_One_off_Default_Total_Price_0
assignments.label: Add to Sum of One-off Default Total Price

assignments.description: Add Default Price x Quantity of the product to the variable. Only applied to QLI with positive quantity.
assignments.name: Add_to_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price
assignments.label: Add to Sum of Positive MRR Default Total Price

assignments.description: Add Default Price x Quantity of the product to the variable. Only applied to QLI with positive quantity.
assignments.name: Add_to_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price_Upsell
assignments.label: Add to Sum of Positive MRR Default Total Price - Upsell

assignments.description: Set "Approval Finalized" field on the DoA record NOW()
assignments.name: Assign_Approval_Finalized_at_Now
assignments.label: Assign Approval Finalized at Now

assignments.description: Assign DoA Line Item values based on OLI in the loop
assignments.name: Assign_DoA_Line_Item_values
assignments.label: Assign DoA Line Item values

assignments.description: Assign values for the new DoA record to be created.
assignments.name: Assign_DoA_values
assignments.label: Assign DoA values

assignments.description: Set Quote values to update with the DoA information
assignments.name: Assign_DoA_values_to_Quote
assignments.label: Assign DoA values to Quote

assignments.description: Assign the entered comments to the DoA record and the Quote.
assignments.name: Assign_given_comments
assignments.label: Assign given comments

assignments.description: Clear DoA Approval Status and related fields. Stage is set back to VOC.
assignments.name: Clear_DoA_Approval_Status
assignments.label: Clear DoA Approval Status

decisions.description: Check whether additional email notification is required or not. The formula resource already calculates the list of emails to be sent if needed.
decisions.name: Additional_email_notification_required
decisions.label: Additional email notification required?

decisions.description: Check if approval is required or not
decisions.name: Approval_Not_Required
decisions.label: Approval Required?

decisions.description: Check if the approval is required
decisions.name: Approval_Required_2
decisions.label: Approval Required? 2

decisions.description: Check whether Quote's DoA Approval Status is Approved
decisions.name: DoA_Already_Approved_0
decisions.label: DoA Already Approved?

decisions.description: Check whether Indexation fields on the account are filled
decisions.name: Indexation_fields_on_account_filled
decisions.label: Indexation fields on account filled?

decisions.description: Check if the OLI is a part of package or not.
decisions.name: Is_a_part_of_package
decisions.label: Is a part of package?

decisions.description: Check whether the product is MRR or One-off product.
decisions.name: Is_MRR_Product
decisions.label: Is MRR Product?

decisions.description: Check if the quantity of the OLI is negative (= Downsell) or not. If downsell, exempt from the discount calculation.
decisions.name: Is_quantity_negative
decisions.label: Is quantity negative?

decisions.description: Check whether Quote products, Invoice Period, and Payment Period are filled.
decisions.name: Necessary_information_filled
decisions.label: Necessary information filled?

rules.name: Filled
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 ) OR ( (NOT 1) AND 2 AND 4 AND 5)
rules.label: Filled

decisions.description: Check if OEM/Partner field is blank.
decisions.name: OEM_Partner_specified
decisions.label: OEM/Partner specified?

decisions.description: Check if the checkbox was ticked in the previous screen.
decisions.name: Start_DoA_Process
decisions.label: Start DoA Process?

decisions.description: Check if the checkbox was ticked in the previous screen.
decisions.name: Submit_Approval_Request
decisions.label: Submit Approval Request?

formulas.description: BODEV-673: Boolean formula to identify if the original formula is found or not for Renewal and Upsell.
formulas.name: BOOL_Has_Original_Contract
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL( {!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "Existing Business-Renewal" ) || ISPICKVAL( {!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "Existing Business-Upsell" ) || ISPICKVAL( {!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "Existing Business-Professional Services" ), NOT(ISNULL( {!RECORD_Original_Contract.Id} )), FALSE )

formulas.description: Boolean to indicate if the Opportunity is an OEM deal or not.
formulas.name: BOOL_OEM_Deals

formulas.description: Formula to represent ARR before discount (Sum of Default Price x Quantity of OLIs)
formulas.name: CURRENCY_ARR_Before_Discount

formulas.description: BODEV-673: Formula to calculate the contraction ARR amount. Used for assessing DoA level for Downsell and Renewal Contraction.
formulas.name: CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR
formulas.expression: /* Downsell: ARR of the Opp (in case ARR < 0) Renewal: Original Renewal ARR - ARR (in case there is contraction) Waive indexation no Renewal? -> Regard as additional 5% contraction */ CASE( TEXT({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}), "Existing Business-Upsell", IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.ARR_manual__c}<0, - {!RECORD_Opportunity.ARR_manual__c}, NULL), "Existing Business-Renewal", IF( ({!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} > {!recordId.ARR__c} ) || {!IndexationDiscount} <> 0, IF({!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} > {!recordId.ARR__c},{!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} - {!recordId.ARR__c}, 0) + {!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} * {!IndexationDiscount} / 100, NULL ), NULL )

formulas.description: BODEV-743: Populate Approval Finalized Date (GMT)
formulas.name: DATE_Date_of_NOW_in_GMT
formulas.expression: DATE( VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 1, 4)), VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 6, 2)), VALUE( MID( TEXT(NOW()), 9, 2)) )

formulas.description: User ID of the Ultimate DoA Level approver
formulas.name: ID_DoA_Approver

formulas.description: User ID of the person who launched the DoA process.
formulas.name: ID_DoA_Requester

formulas.description: Number field to show ARR before discount. Only includes OLIs with positive quantity. Currency formula does not work well when used in a display text (irrelevant symbol appears: known issue).
formulas.name: NUM_ARR_Before_Discount_excl_Downsell

formulas.description: BODEV-673: % of Contraction amount against the total ARR. Only calculated for Downsell and Renewal with Contraction. Value could be between 0-100.
formulas.name: NUM_Contraction_Percent
formulas.expression: /* Downsell: % of Contraction amount against Current ARR of the Account Renewal: % of Contraction amount against Default Price - ARR Waive indexation on Renewal -> Regard as additional 5% contraction */ /* CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR is Null if there is no Contraction amount */ IF( ISNULL( {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} ), 0, CASE( TEXT({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}), "Existing Business-Upsell", IF( {!RECORD_Account.Current_ARR__c} = 0, 0, {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} / {!RECORD_Account.Current_ARR__c} * 100), "Existing Business-Renewal", IF( {!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} = 0 && {!IndexationDiscount} = 0, 0, {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} / {!InitialPriceForContractionCalc} * 100 ), 0 ) )

formulas.description: Formula to calculate MRR discount against sum of Default Total Price
formulas.name: NUM_MRR_Discount

formulas.description: Formula to calculate One-off discount against sum of One-off Default Price
formulas.name: NUM_One_off_Discount

formulas.description: Formula to define the Stage to which the Opp is moved when clearing DoA. Depending on the Opp's condition, it could be back to Proposal or earlier.
formulas.name: Stage_After_Clearing_DoA
formulas.expression:
/* Exceptions on which Stage should NOT be back to VOC 1. Competitor is not added on New Business or Platform Transfer -> Demo */
IF( CASE(TEXT({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}), "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", 1, "New Business - Expansion Portal", 1, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer", 1, 0 ) = 1 && {!RECORD_Opportunity.number_of_opportunity_competitors__c} = 0, "Demo", "VOC" )

formulas.description: BODEV-2982: Formula to return COO or CRO email depending on Opp Type.
formulas.name: TEXT_COO_CRO_Email

formulas.description: BODEV-2982: Formula to return COO/CRO-level approver User ID depending on Opp Type.
formulas.name: TEXT_COO_CRO_Level_Approver

formulas.description: Formula field to return DoA Approval Status to be set on Opp and DoA record. Either "Not Required" or "Pending".
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Approval_Status

formulas.description: Formula to evaluate the DoA level for billing cadence
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_Billing_Cadence
formulas.expression:
/* BDOEV-673: OEM deals are exempted. Upsell / Prof. Service with no ARR products are exempted. For Renewal, if the cadence is not changed from the previous contract, approval is not required. */
IF( {!BOOL_OEM_Deals} || ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "Existing Business-Upsell") || {!RECORD_Opportunity.of_products_MRR__c} = 0 || {!recordId.Invoice_Period__c} = {!RECORD_Original_Contract.Invoice_period__c} || IF( {!BOOL_Has_Original_Contract}, {!recordId.Invoice_Period__c} = {!RECORD_Original_Contract.Invoice_period__c} , FALSE ) || {!recordId.Invoice_Period__c} >= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Invoice_Period_Sales_Rep__c}, "Not Required", IF( {!recordId.Invoice_Period__c} >= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Invoice_Period_COO__c}, "COO", "Pricing Committee" ))

formulas.description: Formula text that concatenates all the DoA Levels
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_Concatenate

formulas.description: BODEV-673: Indicate DoA level for contraction. Only filled in case of Downsell or Renewal with contraction.
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_Contraction

formulas.description: Formula to evaluate the DoA level for credit term
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_Credit_Term
formulas.expression:
/* BODEV-673: OEM deals are exempted. For Renewal and Upsell or Prof. Service, exempted if Payment Period is not changed from the original contract. */
IF( {!BOOL_OEM_Deals} || IF( {!BOOL_Has_Original_Contract}, TEXT( {!recordId.Paymet_Period__c} ) = TEXT( {!RECORD_Original_Contract.Payment_Period__c} ), FALSE ) || ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}, "Due on receipt"), "Not Required", IF( VALUE(LEFT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}), FIND(" ", TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c})) -1)) + IF(RIGHT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}),2) = "ME", 30, 0) <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Payment_Period_Sales_Rep__c}, "Not Required", IF( VALUE(LEFT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}), FIND(" ", TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c})) -1)) + IF(RIGHT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}),2) = "ME", 30, 0) <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Payment_Period_Sales_Manager__c}, "Sales Manager", IF( VALUE(LEFT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}), FIND(" ", TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c})) -1)) + IF(RIGHT(TEXT({!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}),2) = "ME", 30, 0) <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Payment_Period_COO__c}, "COO", "Pricing Committee" ))))

formulas.description: Formula to evaluate the DoA level for MRR Discount
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_MRR_Discount
formulas.expression: /* BODEV-673: OEM deals are exempted. If the Opp has Contraction, it is assessed in DoA Level: Contraction. */ IF( {!BOOL_OEM_Deals} || ( NOT(ISNULL( {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} )) && {!CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price} = 0 ) || {!MRRDiscount}/100 <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Rep__c}, "Not Required", IF( {!MRRDiscount}/100 <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Manager__c}, "Sales Manager", IF( /* BODEV-990 Up to 37% discount is allowed for Sales Manager on USD Workgroup package when sold to 1) Small orgs up to 100 FETs, OR 2) Non-profit orgs */ AND( ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c}, "Workgroup"), ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.CurrencyIsoCode}, "USD"), {!RECORD_Account.NumberOfEmployees} <= 100 || ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Account.Industry_Group__c}, "Education and Government and Non-Profit") ), "Sales Manager", IF( {!MRRDiscount}/100 <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_COO__c}, "COO", "Pricing Committee" ))))

formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_MRR_Discount_Upsell
formulas.expression: /* BODEV-673: OEM deals are exempted. If the Opp has Contraction, it is assessed in DoA Level: Contraction. */ IF( {!BOOL_OEM_Deals} || ( NOT(ISNULL( {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} )) && {!CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price_Upsell} = 0 ) || {!NUM_MRR_Discount_Upsell} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Rep__c}, "Not Required", IF( {!NUM_MRR_Discount_Upsell} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_Sales_Manager__c}, "Sales Manager", IF( /* BODEV-990 Up to 37% discount is allowed for Sales Manager on USD Workgroup package when sold to 1) Small orgs up to 100 FETs, OR 2) Non-profit orgs */ AND( ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c}, "Workgroup"), ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.CurrencyIsoCode}, "USD"), {!RECORD_Account.NumberOfEmployees} <= 100 || ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Account.Industry_Group__c}, "Education and Government and Non-Profit") ), "Sales Manager", IF( {!NUM_MRR_Discount_Upsell} <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.MRR_Discount_COO__c}, "COO", "Pricing Committee" ))))

formulas.description: Formula to evaluate the DoA level for One-off Discount
formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_Level_One_off_Discount
formulas.expression: IF( {!NUM_One_off_Discount}/100 <= 0 || {!BOOL_OEM_Deals}, "Not Required", IF( {!NUM_One_off_Discount}/100 <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.One_off_Discount_VP_of_CS__c}, "Sales Manager", IF( {!NUM_One_off_Discount}/100 <= {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.One_off_Discount_COO__c}, "COO", "Pricing Committee" )))

formulas.name: TEXT_DoA_SalesManager
formulas.expression:
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Sales" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "EMEA", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_EMEA__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Sales" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "US", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_US__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Sales" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "APAC", {!TEXT_COO_CRO_Level_Approver},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Customer Success" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "EMEA", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_EMEA__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Customer Success" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "US", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_US__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Owner.Profile.Name} = "[Bynder] Customer Success" && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "APAC", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_US__c},
IF(ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud") && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "EMEA", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_EMEA__c},
IF(ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud") && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "US", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_US__c},
IF(ISPICKVAL({!RECORD_Opportunity.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud") && {!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "APAC", {!TEXT_COO_CRO_Level_Approver},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "EMEA", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_EMEA__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "US", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_US__c},
IF({!RECORD_Opportunity.Sales_Office_Grouped__c} = "APAC", {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_US__c},
NULL
))))))))))))

formulas.description: Text to display that 5% discount is added to pricing discount.
formulas.name: TEXT_Email_Indexation_Waiver
formulas.expression: IF( {!IndexationDiscount} = 0, "", "(Incl. additional 5% discount recognition from Indexation Waiver)")

formulas.description: Text to represent list of emails to which notification should be sent, other than the ultimate DoA approver. Separated by commma
formulas.name: TEXT_Email_of_Other_DoA_Levels
formulas.expression: /* Additional email notification is required only when Ultimate DoA Level is either COO or Pricing Committee. */ IF({!TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level} = "COO" || {!TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level} = "Pricing Committee", {!TEXT_SalesManager_Email} & IF({!TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level} = "Pricing Committee", "," & {!TEXT_COO_CRO_Email}, "" ), "" )

formulas.description: Displays the approver when indexation is waived
formulas.name: TEXT_Indexation_Waiver_Approver

formulas.description: Formula to extract only Product Name from Name of QLI
formulas.name: TEXT_QLI_Product_Name
TEXT_SalesManager_Email
formulas.expression: CASE({!TEXT_DoA_SalesManager}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_EMEA__c}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Email_Sales_Manager_EMEA__c}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_Sales_Manager_US__c},{!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Email_Sales_Manager_US__c}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_EMEA__c}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.Email_VP_of_CS_EMEA__c}, {!$Setup.DoA_Setting__c.DoA_Approver_VP_of_CS_US__c}, NULL, /* for CS US, both COO and Sales Manager are Heidi */ NULL )

formulas.description: BODEV-673: Formula text to show Contraction in case of Renewal and Upsell with contraction
formulas.name: TEXT_Screen_Contraction
formulas.expression: IF( ISNULL( {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} ), "", "Contraction: " & TEXT( {!recordId.CurrencyIsoCode} ) & " " & TEXT( {!CURRENCY_Contraction_ARR} ) & " (" & TEXT( {!NUM_Contraction_Percent} ) & "%)" & IF( {!IndexationDiscount} = 0, "", "(Incl. Indexation Waiver on Renewal regarded as additional 5% discount)") )

formulas.description: BODEV-1354: Conditional text to indicate the discount % includes extra 5% in case of indexation wavier.
formulas.name: TEXT_Screen_MRR_Discount_Indexation
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL( {!recordId.Waive_Indexation__c} , "Yes") || ISPICKVAL( {!recordId.Waive_Indexation__c} , "First Year"), " (incl. additional 5% discount recognition from Indexation Waiver)", "" )

formulas.description: Formula text to show "VP of Customer Success" as additional approver (when it is required) in the Screen to confirm to submit approval request.
formulas.name: TEXT_Screen_VP_CS_Approver
formulas.expression: /* BODEV-673: Deprecated as One-off approval also goes to Sales Director. IF( TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level = "Sales Manager" && TEXT_DoA_Level_One_off_Discount = "VP of Customer Success", "VP of Customer Success", "") */ ""

formulas.description: Formula to evaluate the ultimate DoA level
formulas.name: TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level
TEXT_Ultimate_DoA_Level_ARR_Quote

formulas.description: Formula for timestamp
formulas.name: TIME_Now

Flow.label: Screen: Finalize Prices & Terms On Quote

loops.description: Loop on QLI to create DoA Line Item records under the created DoA record.
loops.name: Loop_QLI_to_create_DoA_Line_Items
loops.label: Loop QLI to create DoA Line Items

loops.description: Loop on Quote Line Item to calculate MRR/One-off discount and identify the lowest 3rd party product margin.
loops.name: QLI_Loop
loops.label: QLI Loop

recordCreates.description: Create DoA Line Items based on the collection
recordCreates.name: Create_DoA_Line_Items
recordCreates.label: Create DoA Line Items

recordCreates.description: Create DoA record based on Quote information.
recordCreates.name: Create_DoA_record
recordCreates.label: Create DoA record

recordLookups.description: BODEV-673: Get the previous contract Opp to compare payment terms.
recordLookups.name: Get_Previous_Contract
recordLookups.label: Get Previous Contract

recordLookups.description: Get User record of the Quote Owner
recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Owner
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Owner

recordUpdates.name: Update_Quote_to_clear_DoA_Approval_Status
recordUpdates.label: Update Quote to clear DoA Approval Status

screens.description: Final screen in case of approval not required
screens.name: Complete_Not_Required
screens.label: Complete: Not Required

fields.name: TEXT_Completed_Not_Required
fields.fieldText:
Approval is not required for this Opportunity.

Now the prices and terms have been fixed and you can move forward to next stages.

screens.description: Screen to confirm before triggering the approval process
screens.name: Confirm_to_submit_approval_process
screens.label: Confirm to submit approval process

fields.name: CONFIRM_Submit_approval
fields.fieldText:
Approval is required from the following approver(s).


{!TEXT_Indexation_Waiver_Approver}

{!TEXT_Screen_DOA_Approver}

{!TEXT_Screen_VP_CS_Approver}


ARR Discount: {!DoAARRDiscount}%

One-off Discount: {!NUM_One_off_Discount}%

Invoice Period: {!recordId.Invoice_Period__c} months

Payment Period: {!recordId.Paymet_Period__c}

{!TEXT_Screen_Contraction}

Contraction Discount: {!NUM_Contraction_Percent}%

Indexation Waived: {!recordId.Waive_Indexation__c}


ARR before discount: {!recordId.CurrencyIsoCode} {!NUM_ARR_Before_Discount_excl_Downsell}

(* excl. products with negative quantity)

Tick below checkbox to submit the approval request.


You can also leave comments to explain why discounts/special payment terms are given.

screens.description: Confirm the user to trigger the DoA process.
screens.name: Confirm_to_submit_DoA_process
screens.label: Confirm to submit DoA process

fields.name: TEXT_Confirm_to_submit_DoA_process
fields.fieldText:
In order to proceed to Legal Review or later stage, you need to finalize the prices and terms.

In case DoA approval is required, you cannot edit the record until the process is accepted/rejected/recalled.

Once finalized, you cannot edit the prices and terms (Products, Invoice Period, Payment Period).


Tick below checkbox to fix the prices and terms.

screens.description: DoA Approval Request has been submitted and is pending for approval.
screens.name: DoA_Approval_Pending
screens.label: DoA Approval Pending

fields.name: TEXT_Approval_Pending
fields.fieldText:
DoA Approval Request has been submitted and is awaiting for approval.

If you need to cancel the approval request and update the Quote,

recall the approval process in the Approval History section.

fields.name: ErrorInfo
fields.fieldText: Indexation information is not filled on the account. Please contact the legal team.

fields.name: TEXT_Necessary_information_not_filled
fields.fieldText:
Either of the following information is not filled. Please specify these information and retry.

  • Opportunity Product(s)
  • Invoice Period
  • Payment Period
  • Contract Start/End Date (Special Billing Scenario - "Free Month Discount")

screens.name: Pricing_factors_are_not_applied_yet
screens.label: Pricing factors are not applied yet

fields.name: PricingNotApplied
fields.fieldText: Pricing factors are not applied yet, Please apply by clicking on 'Apply Pricing Factors' button and retry the DOA process.

screens.description: Reset DoA Approval Status if needed
screens.name: Reset_DoA_Approval_Status
screens.label: Reset DoA Approval Status

fields.name: TEXT_Confirm_Reset_DoA_Approval_Status
fields.fieldText: The prices and terms has been successfully unlocked.

textTemplates.description: Body of Email Notification sent DoA Levels other than Ultimate DoA Approver. (Ultimate DoA Approver received approval request notification sent from Approval Process)
textTemplates.name: TEXT_Email_Notification_Body

variables.description: Collection to create DoA Line Items based on OLIs
variables.name: COLLECTION_New_DoA_Line_Items

variables.description: Collection variable to store Opportunity Products under the current Opportunity.
variables.name: COLLECTION_Opportunity_Products

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Default Price x Quantity of MRR products.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_MRR_Default_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Total Price of MRR products. Only includes OLIs with negative quantity.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_Negative_MRR_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Default Price x Quantity of One-off products. One-off products in a package are excluded.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_One_off_Default_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Total Price of One-off products. One-off products in a package are excluded.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_One_off_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Default Price x Quantity of MRR products. Only includes OLIs with positive quantity.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Default_Total_Price

variables.description: Variable to store the sum of Total Price of MRR products. Only includes QLIs with positive quantity.
variables.name: CURRENCY_Sum_of_Positive_MRR_Total_Price

variables.description: Account record to which the Opp is associated.
variables.name: RECORD_Account

variables.description: Variable for the new DoA record to be created
variables.name: RECORD_New_DoA

variables.description: DoA Line Item record to copy OLI values in each loop for OLIs
variables.name: RECORD_New_DoA_Line_Item

variables.description: Account record specified in OEM/Partner field of the Opp
variables.name: RECORD_OEM_Partner_Account

variables.description: User record of the Opp Owner
variables.name: RECORD_Opp_Owner

variables.description: User record of Manager of Opp Owner
variables.name: RECORD_Opp_Owner_Manager

variables.description: Variable to store the current Opportunity record.
variables.name: RECORD_Opportunity

variables.description: BODEV-673: Variable to store the original contract of the Opp. Renewal: Previous contract. Upsell: Active current contract.
variables.name: RECORD_Original_Contract

variables.description: A variable of empty string that works as a line break when used in other text resources. Reference: https://trailblazer.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=0873A000000lIxrQAE
variables.name: TEXT_Line_Break

variables.description: Text variable to store ID of the Opportunity record
variables.name: TEXT_Opportunity_ID
